constituent: translate, say, words, keitai, mouth, shaku-hachi, flag, stick
koohiiStory1: You cannot pretend to translate into words the melody of the shakuhachi!
koohiiStory2: You all know that ´shakuhachi´ is a slang word for blowjob, right? In this kanji you got a job as a TRANSLATOR for Japanese porno movies. So you sit there all day translating dirty WORDS and watching girls perform SHAKUHACHI. This is the life!
